ai-ne36:60.1_0: So, having become three, and three drifts of craving, one who is good conduct and view.
ai-ne36:61.1_0: Of these two people, that person who is corrupted, Craving, disdain and contempt, jealousy, stinginess, deceit, deviousness, obstinacy, bad desires, and wrong views, and ignorance.
ai-ne36:62.1_0: It is because of the two persons that you meditate in balanced mindfulness and situational awareness, mindfulness and situational awareness, immersion, knowledge, and freedom.
ai-ne36:63.1_0: This is called Jambudīpa, not for the sake of subduing the advantage of the Three or the ground.
ai-ne36:63.2_0: Hence it is said: “Here, unskillfully, using them look at the front.”
ai-ne36:63.3_0: not (in return to) the lower realms,
